descriptionHtml:
General Tullius is my favorite character in skyrim but i hated how his armor was a different color scheme then the rest of the empire... so i fixed it. also it works with deadric gloves and boots, which makes me happy.

P.s. I am currently working on a complete re-texture of the entire legion as well as custom armors for legion placed Jarls. I\'m doing some mesh work so it might take a while and i might put off some of it until the CS comes out but I\'m starting it now do to all the requests.

thank you all for your support, endorse and share the love.

installation-
just drag and drop... you can do it! I HAVE FAITH IN YOU!
author: KnightDeDraco

files.name: Tullius armor retex for men and women
